Package Servlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddGoalServlet
    This allows you to add a goal
    AddSkillServlet
    This servlet is used for adding your skills to the database this loads the jsp page and gets the information from it and passes it to the DAO
    AddUnitServlet
    This servlet is used for adding units to the DAO and loading the jsp page
    CreateAccountServlet
    This is used to create a account it takes information from the jsp page (form) and passes it to the constructor to make new accounts.
    DeleteUnitServlet
    This JSP pages allows you to delete units and then it will redirect you back to the show units page.
    GraphTest  
    LoginServlet  
    LogoutServlet  
    ServletHome  
    ShowGoalServlet
    Gets the data from the jsp page and then sends it to the database.
    ShowSkillsServlet
    This is to get all the skills from the Database using the dao and load the jsp page with them values in.
    ShowUnitsServlet
    This is to get all the units that have been inserted from the database and show them on a jsp page
